last_episode_to_air.name: Season 2 Reunion
last_episode_to_air.overview: Season two of Little Women: Dallas wraps up with a real barn-burner of a finale. All of the girls get together to try to put out the fire by airing out their grievances with each other, but will their attempts to resolve their issues only add more fuel to the flames?

name: Little Women: Dallas
overview: Follow the adventures of a group of young, vibrant little women living in Dallas. People often stare, but it's not because they're little, it's because they can command a room. The show centers around the ladies' real lives and features true tension and tenderness between a group of loyal - and sometimes disloyal - friends.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Season one sees Bri Barlup and Emily Fernandez move from Atlanta to Texas after dealing with some hard times, ready to shake things up with a whole group of new little ladies who prove that although everything is not always “bigger” in Texas, the drama certainly is!

episodes.name: Everything's Bigger in Texas
episodes.overview: The ladies celebrate Caylea’s 21st birthday. Emily and Bri must decide if The Cheeks will stay together or part ways. Tiffani’s boyfriend makes a surprise visit, but not everyone is happy about it.

episodes.name: Dallas, Not Austin
episodes.overview: Tiffani hosts a Texas-style BBQ so everyone can get to know her boyfriend better. Bri invites the group out to a lake for a day of fun, but things get heated when Tiffani gives Caylea some life-disrupting news.

episodes.name: Trading Spaces
episodes.overview: Caylea moves out, Austin moves in and Wooda leaves Bri…for now. After months of mourning, Emily is finally ready to try and say goodbye to the son she lost.

episodes.name: Right to Refuse
episodes.overview: The roommate drama isn’t over when Tiffani drops an expensive bomb on Caylea. Amanda prepares for her bodybuilding competition, but is thrown off by a surprise drug test. And a football party ends in disaster.

episodes.name: Friday Night Fights
episodes.overview: Southern manners go out the window when Caylea’s football party becomes an all-out brawl.  Amanda goes on a blind date with one of the tallest men in Texas.

episodes.name: Party Crasher
episodes.overview: Brichelle attempts to apologize the group, but the girls aren’t ready to forgive and forget. Asta’s Cosplay party is cut short when Caylea gets a surprise visit from someone.

episodes.name: Man Up
episodes.overview: Asta finally goes in for genetic testing to find out what kind of dwarfism she has. Meanwhile, Tiffani runs into problems with Austin, while Amanda reconnects with an old flame.

episodes.name: Hello! Goodbye!
episodes.overview: When their relationship hits a rocky patch, Tiffani sends Austin packing. After reuniting, Amanda and her ex get serious. And tension rises between Asta and Emily over their new business venture.

episodes.name: Birthday Blow-out
episodes.overview: Bri puts pressure on Wooda to define their relationship. Emily decides to open a mini-bar in Dallas without Asta and Ty. And after tensions rise at Asta’s birthday party someone gets served.

episodes.name: A New Chapter
episodes.overview: Asta considers an offer that could launch her art career and Caylea is confronted about her back-stabbing behavior. Meanwhile, Emily decides that she’s ready to have another baby and Tiffani has a health scare that could change her life.

episodes.name: Not So Silent Partner
episodes.overview: Bri is forced to make a tough decision about Meek’s health. Emily asks Terra to be her business partner, and Caylea is shocked by her pregnancy test results.

episodes.name: Dallas Strong
episodes.overview: Amanda enters her first bodybuilding competition in Dallas and Asta tries to flake on her business deal with Emily. Meanwhile, Caylea deals with some big changes and Tiffani gets the surprise of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Mini-Disaster
episodes.overview: Asta is under pressure with competing deadlines for her art show and mini bar logo. Emily and Terra butt heads over their vision of the bar and all the girls are shocked to learn about what is going on with Tiffani and Austin.

episodes.name: Season 1 Reunion
episodes.overview: The cast of Little Women: Dallas join host Terra Jol  for a look back at a wild season in The Lone Star State. Emotions run high when the ladies answer tough questions about their relationships and things get serious when several surprise guests join them on stage. Viewers will also get a special look ahead at the next season.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Season one sees Bri Barlup and Emily Fernandez move from Atlanta to Texas after dealing with some hard times, ready to shake things up with a whole group of new little ladies who prove that although everything is not always “bigger” in Texas, the drama certainly is!

episodes.name: Girl Code
episodes.overview: The season premiere of “Little Women: Dallas” finds the ladies divided into two groups following last season’s explosive reunion where Caylea accused Amanda of starting a romantic relationship with her ex-boyfriend. Any hope of restoring the fractured friendships is shattered when the ladies all meet up at a nightclub and Caylea and Amanda take the gloves off.

episodes.name: Unlikely Alliances
episodes.overview: Amanda bounces back from Caylea’s assault and embarks on a dangerous new career. Emily confronts Caylea about disrespecting the memory of her son, leaving Caylea with no allies. And Brichelle emerges as peacemaker, asking everyone to visit a special place where they can “smash each other’s faces without smashing each other’s faces.” Will Caylea show up and face the group?

episodes.name: A Little BBQ, A Lot of Beef
episodes.overview: Bri tries to kick start her modeling career with a risqué move! Meanwhile, when Tiffani and Austin seek outside relationship help, Austin loses his cool. And the beef between Caylea, Emily and Amanda gets heated at Dallas’s Meat Church.

episodes.name: "Down In The Mud"
episodes.overview: Amanda’s new girlfriend sheds light on her relationship with Caylea. Single gals Bri and Brichelle try their luck with a matchmaker and get decidedly mixed results. With her friendship with the Cheeks on the ropes, Caylea strikes out on her own as a host at mudwrestling events. But when she hits a roadblock with her new boss, will Caylea’s career be over before it starts?

episodes.name: Baby Daddy Issues
episodes.overview: Emily goes into attack mode after she learns that Tiffani has been showing Lontel’s mugshot to the rest of the group. When Caylea introduces D’Quan to her dad, he expresses concern. Tiffani and Austin stress test their relationship at a survival school, where sparks fly. And a sword fight between Emily and Tiffani gets out of hand at the Renaissance Faire.

episodes.name: Pretty Little Liar
episodes.overview: The girls deal with the aftermath of the Renaissance Faire fight and Caylea confronts Tiffani about Austin’s verbal abuse. Amanda decides to get breast augmentation surgery, but her blood pressure takes a dangerous nosedive. And Brichelle invites the girls to a charity event, but it’s the after-party that makes jaws drop.

episodes.name: Open Mic Fight
episodes.overview: When Amanda makes a startling admission, it leaves the ladies with mixed emotions. Emily is rushed to the doctor for a medical emergency. And when a huge opportunity comes her way, Caylea’s music career could be on a fast-track…as long as old drama doesn’t derail it.

episodes.name: Can You Hear Me Now?
episodes.overview: Best friends Asta and Amanda come to blows over Chase’s behavior at the Open Mic night. A fearful Emily goes under the knife to fix her ailing hearing. Asta starts driving lessons with decidedly mixed results. Caylea and D’Quan appear on “The Rickey Smiley Morning Show” to plug their new song. And Caylea gets rattled when a surprise caller catches her off guard during the interview.

episodes.name: Indecent Proposal
episodes.overview: Just as Amanda's acting career moves forward with her first audition, her friendships with Asta and Caylea fall apart. Bri sets her mind on a career in nursing, but worries she will come up short. And when Caylea throws her boyfriend D'Quan a 21st birthday party, she's the one who gets the surprise of a lifetime.

episodes.name: Girls Trip
episodes.overview: Caylea's and D’Quan's engagement hits a snag when his mother doesn't approve. Emily’s dreams of having another baby are in jeopardy. Tiffani is ready to be engaged, but is Austin? A girls’ trip to a Dude Ranch is interrupted by one of the guys.

episodes.name: Season 2 Reunion
episodes.overview: Season two of Little Women: Dallas wraps up with a real barn-burner of a finale. All of the girls get together to try to put out the fire by airing out their grievances with each other, but will their attempts to resolve their issues only add more fuel to the flames?
